attributes.action: introduce a minimum speed to be able to drive on motorways/dual carriage ways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like in Holland they should introduce a minimum speed, 60kph (=40mph) to legally be able to drive on motorways/dual carriage ways. This will stop pedestrians, cyclists, mopeds, disabled vehicles, agricultural vehicles and other slow moving vehicles causing an obstruction. This will create a better slow of traffic and will improve safety.
